casebody.data:
WILMINGTON TRUST COMPANY, Trustee
v.
Herbert H. BACHELDER, Jr., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 5, 2019

Herbert H. Bachelder, Jr., self-represented, in support of the petition.

Marissa I. Delinks, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 904, 205 A.3d 819 (2019), is denied.
